title.rendered: Centurion D10 Smart Turbo Sliding Gate

content.rendered:
Centurion D10 Smart Turbo Sliding Gate

The Centurion D10 Turbo Smart is a legendary high-volume performer for sliding gates up to 1000kg. The D10 Turbo SMART now offers you speed, security, endurance and reliability, quicker and easier than with any other gate motor in the D10’s class, thanks to SMART technology and wireless connectivity

Centurion D10 Smart Turbo Sliding Gate Specifications

Brand Centurion
Model D10 Turbo SMART
Compatible remotes Nova 1 Button, 2 Button and 4 Button(2 Included)
Compatible backup batteries Securi-Prod 12v 7.2Amp(2 Included) and Securi-Prod 12v 8Amp batteries
Compatible controller PCB SmartX controller
Compatible antitheft bracket D10 SMART Bracket
Compatible safety beams Photon SMART wireless beams
Compatible rack Steel rack (2 x 2 meters included)
Input voltage 90V – 240V AC ± 10% @ 50Hz *1
Current consumption (Mains) 250mA
Battery charger current output 1.8A @ 27.4V ± 1%
Maximum number of operations per day 750
Duty cycle – Mains present 25%
Motor voltage 24V DC
Motor power supply Battery-driven (Standard Capacity – 2 x 12V 7.2Ah)
Current consumption (motor at rated load) 2410A
Motor push force – starting 24Kgf
Gate mass – maximum 1000Kg
Gate length – maximum 50m
Drive Pinion 20T Module 4
Collision Sensing Electronic
Operating temperature range -15°C to +50°C
Onboard receiver type Code-hopping multichannel receiver with selective add and delete
Receiver code storage capacity 1500 Remote buttons
Receiver frequency 433.92Mhz
Degree of protection IP54
Gate motor dimension 295mm(l) x 205mm(w) x 390mm(h)
Packaging dimensions mm(l) x mm(w) x 0mm(h)
Mass of unit packed 22Kg
Kit Warranty excluding batteries 24 Months carry-in product manufacturer’s warranty

excerpt.rendered:
Attractive styling
• SMART speed
• SMART hardware
• SMART connectivity
• SMART SECURITY
• SMART diagnostics
• Uninterrupted security and convenience
